name: DestinationNowhere
description:
WASD to move, space to interact with ship objects. Interact with the Captain's Chair to sleep after you've finished checking on the ship each day. 

This is a game that came out of the 12th NSI Game Jam in Sydney, Australia. The theme was Outer Limits.

We went into this jam with the goal to get our heads around Yarn Spinner, a branching narrative tool by Secret Labs. We had a few issues caused by our own unfamiliarity with the tool, but all in all, it was a good time.

The game was made primarily by a two person team, but we were fortunate enough to have character art provided by a friend and sound & music by the very talented sound designer @meriamber at the jam.
